sentence.Network_en: He has surprised us before with his inventiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 以前他的发明才能曾令我们惊讶。

sentence.Network_en: He had a good mind - bright, attentive studious, unmarked by originality or inventiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他头脑很清醒 - 人很聪明, 读书又用功, 不过没有突出的独立见解和创新的意见.

sentence.Network_en: In the search for laws he displayed inventiveness in hypotheses.
sentence.Network_cn: 在寻找定律时,他发挥了对假说的创造性.

entry.tran: 善于发明的;有创造才能的
entry.def: An inventive person is good at inventing things or has clever and original ideas.

example.tran: 斯特罗曼永远求新的舞蹈设计

example.ex: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
example.tran: 它激发我在自己烹饪时更富创造性。

auth_sentence.content: His inventiveness, his joyful naivety, made him downright unplayable.
auth_sentence.res_content: His inventiveness, his joyful naivety, made him downright unplayable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His inventiveness, his joyful naivety, made him downright unplayable.

auth_sentence.content: But scarcity of equipment never once hinders their considerable ambition and inventiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: But scarcity of equipment never once hinders their considerable ambition and inventiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But scarcity of equipment never once hinders their considerable ambition and inventiveness.

auth_sentence.content: Skill, talent, inventiveness, all can become overbearing and intrusive.
